section.title: Procedure: Creating the Embedded Browse
section.description: The following procedure assumes that the developer has opened the form in the Form Editor. Follow these instructions to create an embedded browse similar to Object1.

step.description: Sketch the embedded browse on the form.

section.title: Procedure: Formatting the Embedded Browse
section.description: The following procedure assumes that the developer has opened the form in the Form Editor . Follow these instructions to format an embedded browse similar to Object1 .

step.description: Double click the browse so that the dark outline appears.
Position the cursor over the row separator until the special cursor appears, then drag the line until the row is the correct height.
Position the cursor over the column separator until the special cursor appears, then drag the line until the column is the correct width.
Click a cell in the Vendor_name column, right click and select Properties....
Change the Column title field to "Name".
Repeat for the other columns to give them appropriate names.

section.note: You can also set the width of the column here by entering an inch value.
